model.agent.humanAgent.tacticalLevel.navigation

Class StuckDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.agent.humanAgent.tacticalLevel.navigation.StuckDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updatable

    public class StuckDetector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updatable
    Detects if an agent is stuck. It is part of the navigation module.
    Author:
    S.A.M. Janssen

    • Method Detail

      • isStuck

        public boolean isStuck(boolean includeStopMoving,
                       double secondsStuck)
        Determines if the agent is stuck for a given number of seconds. Stuck is defined as moving at most 0.2m in secondsStuck seconds.
        Parameters:
        includeStopMoving - Determines if the agent should be considered stuck if he has a stop order.
        secondsStuck - The number of seconds it takes before an agent is considered stuck.
        Returns:
        True if the agent is stuck, false otherwise.

      • isStuck

        public boolean isStuck(double secondsStuck)
        Determines if the agent is stuck for a given number of seconds. Stuck is defined as moving at most 0.2m in secondsStuck seconds.
        Parameters:
        secondsStuck - The number of seconds it takes before an agent is considered stuck.
        Returns:
        True if the agent is stuck, false otherwise.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the stuck detector.

      • update

        public void update(int timeStep)
        Updates the stuck parameters.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable
        Parameters:
        timeStep - The time step.
